demo3.web

Class ExceptionThrowingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • demo3.web.ExceptionThrowingController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/throw")
public class ExceptionThrowingController
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller whose request-handler methods deliberately throw exceptions to demonstrate the points discussed in the Blog.

    Expects a SimpleMappingExceptionResolver to handle its exceptions.

    Author:
    Paul Chapman

      • throwDatabaseException

        @RequestMapping(value="/databaseException")
java.lang.String throwDatabaseException()
                                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Simulates a database exception by always throwing DatabaseException. Handled by SimpleMappingExceptionResolver.
        Returns:
        Nothing - it always throws the exception.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - Always thrown.
        java.lang.Exception

      • throwInvalidCreditCard

        @RequestMapping(value="/invalidCreditCard")
java.lang.String throwInvalidCreditCard()
                                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Simulates an illegal credit-card exception by always throwing InvalidCreditCardException. Handled by SimpleMappingExceptionResolver.
        Returns:
        Nothing - it always throws the exception.
        Throws:
        InvalidCreditCardException - Always thrown.
        java.lang.Exception

      • throwCustomException

        @RequestMapping(value="/supportInfoException")
java.lang.String throwCustomException()
                                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Simulates a database exception by always throwing CustomException. Must be caught by an exception handler.
        Returns:
        Nothing - it always throws the exception.
        Throws:
        CustomException - Always thrown.
        java.lang.Exception

      • throwUnhandledException

        @RequestMapping(value="/unhandledException")
java.lang.String throwUnhandledException()
                                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Simulates a database exception by always throwing UnhandledException. Must be caught by an exception handler.
        Returns:
        Nothing - it always throws the exception.
        Throws:
        UnhandledException - Always thrown.
        java.lang.Exception
